title: Leading cause of ransomware infection 2019
summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Cause of ransomware infection, and Percentage of respondents in each Cause of ransomware infection on the y axis.
Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has the highest Percentage of respondents and Malicious websites/web ads has the lowest Percentage of respondents.
The highest Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has 51.0 more Percentage of respondents than the lowest Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Percentage of respondents for 6 number of Cause of ransomware infections.
The Percentage of respondents is highest at Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails and lowest at Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 6 columns on the x axis representing Cause of ransomware infection, and Percentage of respondents in each Cause of ransomware infection on the y axis.
Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has the highest Percentage of respondents and Malicious websites/web ads has the lowest Percentage of respondents.
The highest Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has 51.0 more Percentage of respondents than the lowest Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Cause of ransomware infection in the x axis and Percentage of respondents in the y axis.
Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails has the highest Percentage of respondents and Malicious websites/web ads has the lowest Percentage of respondents.
The second highest Percentage of respondents is appeared to be the Cause of ransomware infection Lack of cyber security training.
The difference of Percentage of respondents between the highest and lowest Cause of ransomware infection is 51.0.

Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails is higher than any other Cause of ransomware infections with value 67.0, followed by Lack of cyber security training, and Weak passwords/access management. Down to Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads with the lowest value 16.0.
Cause of ransomware infection Malicious websites/web ads, and Report clickbait have a similar Percentage of respondents that is 16.0.
The Cause of ransomware infection Spam/phishing emails tends to be 2.12 percent higher than average.
The Percentage of respondents is 190.0 if we add up values of all Cause of ransomware infections.
